remarks: Choose generators for each cyclic group in ~ ablfac .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement:
ablfac.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablfac.c $e |- C = { r e. ( SubGrp ` G ) | ( G |`s r ) e. ( CycGrp i^i ran pGrp ) } $.
ablfac.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
ablfac.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
ablfac2.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
ablfac2.s $e |- S = ( k e. dom w |-> ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. ( w ` k ) ) ) ) $.
ablfac2 $p |- ( ph -> E. w e. Word B ( S : dom w --> C /\ G dom DProd S /\ ( G DProd S ) = B ) ) $.
$d .x. k w $.
$d B k n r w $.
$d C k n w $.
$d G k n r w $.
$d S r $.
$d k n ph w $.
